page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: FOOTBALL IS THE MOST POPULAR SPORT AMONGST MY FRIENDS.IN CARNOUSTIE THERE IS A JUNIOR FOOTBALL TEAM.MOST OF THE BOYS WHO PLAY ARE AGED BETWEEN 10 TO 15.MY FRIENDS EITHER PLAY FOOTBALL OR SUPPORT FOOTBALL TEAMS.THEY USUALLY SUPPORT PREMIER LEAGUE TEAMS AND ENGLISH LEAGUE TEAMS,SUCH AS EVERTON AND DUNDEE.THE GAME OF FOOTBALL WITH RULES STARTED IN 1863 BUT SCOTLAND HAVE PRODUCED MANY FAMOUS FOOTBALL PLAYERS,WHO NOW PLAY FOR ENGLISH TEAMS.THEY EARN MORE MONEY IN ENGLAND AND ENJOY THE PRESTIGE OF PLAYING FOR A GOOD TEAM.TO BECOME A FOOTBALL PLAYER YOU SHOULD PLAY FOR A JUNIOR TEAM AND TRY TO BE NOTICED BY "SCOUTS" OR MANAGERS.YOU HAVE TO PUT IN A LOT OF PRACTICE.USUALLY I TRAIN 3 DAYS A WEEK AND 1 OR 2 GAMES A WEEK.I PLAY FOOTBALL IN ALL MY SPARE TIME.
